message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SY 

The paper proposes a new method for regularizing neural networks using a probability distribution over the activations of all layers of the model. This method involves a form of data augmentation and is demonstrated to improve test accuracy and lower test-set cross-entropy for neural networks trained on image datasets. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Additionally, since the method involves a form of dropout, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, since the method involves a form of probabilistic modeling, cs.SY (Systems and Control) is a possible sub-category.
